name: Ntrs client
tagline: A simple Android client for a not so simple translator
body:
### ANT Client
Project description

This application communicates with a remote translator server running moses and
fetches the translations. 

Beyond providing the translations, the application supports the following features:

1. Text to speech
    -Listen to the foreign language sentence in varying speeds

2. Caching of good translations
    -Good translations can be cached for quick reference

3. Visualization of the translation process
    -Show the mapping of words from foreign language to the target language

4. Scoring
    -Scores from moses are used to give the user a handle over the reliability of the translations
